name: Flowers
description: Flowers improve the happiness of residents. Improves housing quality by 5.

name: Scrap Metal Recycling
description: Two stone is now used to make a machine part instead of three.

name: Disable Factory
description: The factory will fully halt production.

name: Disable Factory
description: The factory will fully halt production and not use any stone.

name: Disable Factory
description: The factory will fully halt production and not use any refined metals.

name: Turbo Boost
description: The factory will work twice as fast, but also use two more stone per machine part.

name: Firmware Modding
description: The factory will work 50% faster, but also use one more stone per unit of refined metal produced.

name: Enable Factory
description: The factory will work normally.

name: Enable Lab
description: The lab will work normally.

name: Disable Lab
description: The lab will not use any machine parts nor produce knowledge. It can still boost Refined Metal Factories.

name: Literature Reviews
description: The lab will not use any machine parts, but its knowledge output is halved. It can still boost Refined Metal Factories.

name: Genetic Crop Engineering
description: Crops of adjacent farms produce 10 more food per harvest.

name: Tree Growth Gas
description: Trees in adjacent tree plantations grow 20% faster.

name: Better Pickaxes
description: Use better pickaxes to improve mining speed by 20%.

name: AI-assisted Mining
description: Use a computer system to improve mining speed by 30%.

name: Die Shrink
description: The factory will work 50% faster and use two less units of refined metals per computer chip.

name: Better Light Show
description: The entertainment capacity of the building will be doubled.

name: Improved Medical Education
description: The quality of this building will be increased by 25% of the education happiness.

name: Computer-Aided Diagnosis
description: The quality of this building will be increased by 25 and its capacity will be doubled.

name: Remote Control
description: The worker of the rock teleporter can teleport stone even if they're somewhere else. This allows them to help mine stone as well.

name: Bigger TV
description: Improves housing quality by 5. Adds capacity for one resident.

name: Air-Cleaning Plant
description: A plant that's been cultivated to be extremely good at cleaning the air. Improves housing quality by 10 and makes residents live longer.

name: Heated Bed
description: Improves housing quality by 20.

name: Smart Chairs
description: Improves housing quality by 10.

name: Modern Conveniences
description: Improves housing quality by 15.

name: Pet Projects
description: Gather knowledge.

name: Craft Machine Parts
description: Create machine parts from wood.

name: Star Database
description: This building produces 50% more knowledge. If the Precise Universe Mapping upgrade from the Supercomputer has been researched, it produces 500% more knowledge instead.

name: Extremely Soft Beds
description: Improves housing quality by 10.

name: Board Game Collection
description: Improves housing quality by 15.

name: Smart Lights
description: Improves housing quality by 15.

name: Living Computer
description: Improves housing quality by 20.

name: Better Tools
description: Improves housing quality by 20.

name: Enable
description: The Misdirector is predictably unpredictable.

name: Overclock
description:
Any attempt at teleportation will bring people here. Perfect to stop excess productivity.
The knowledge gain per misdirection is reduced by 90% because the device is overloaded.

name: Mostly Disable
description: There's an OFF button. It mostly works.

name: Disable
description: With some effort, the Misdirector can be tamed.

name: Indoor Pond
description: Improves housing quality by 15.

name: Rock
description: Produce stone.

name: Tree
description: Produce wood.

name: Crops
description: Produce food.

name: Peer-Reviewed Pickaxe Part Papers
description: The boost to stone production is increased and scales faster with knowledge production.

name: Fossil Detector
description: Whenever a rock teleporter teleports a meteoroid, there is a tiny chance that a fossil is detected in it. When this happens, you gain 10000 knowledge.

name: Ultra-High-Tech Screwdriver
description: You gain two more knowledge for each machine part used.

name: Automatic Water Management
description: The passive growth speed of these trees is tripled.

name: Culinary Herbs
description: Increases the capacity of restaurants to the left and right of the garden.

name: Medicinal Herbs
description: Improves the medical happiness. Herb gardens can't provide more than 20% of the medical happiness in total.
